title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Opportunities by Time Commitment
body: Volunteer: Opportunities by Time Commitment          Short-Term Opportunities (One Day) Adopt-a-Trail Coho and Steelhead Monitoring Habitat Restoration Kule Loklo Workday Native Plant Seed Collection: Short-term  Range Watershed Restoration  Stream Team      Intermediate-Term Opportunities (One to five months) Habitat Restoration: Intermediate-term Habitat Restoration Tool Manager Harbor Seal Monitoring Native Plant Nursery Operator Native Plant Seed Collection: Intermediate-term Snowy Plover Docent  Tule Elk Docent  Winter Wildlife Docent      Longer-Term Opportunities (Six months or longer) Morgan Horse Ranch Museum Management Native Plant Nursery Operator Visitor Protection Visitor Services Volunteer Program Management Assistant      Top of Page
